description.value:
By 6th level, whenever you finish a long rest, you can consult your Star Map for omens. When you do so, roll a die. Until you finish your next long rest, you gain access to a special reaction based on whether you rolled an even or an odd number on the die:

Weal (even). Whenever a creature rolls an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a d6 and add a number rolled from the total. You can wait to use your reaction until after it rolls the d20, but you must decide before the DM says whether the roll succeeds or fails.

Woe (odd). Whenever a creature rolls an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a d6 and subtract a number rolled from the total. You can wait to use your reaction until after it rolls the d20, but you must decide before the DM says whether the roll succeeds or fails.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

activation.condition: a creature rolls an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw
